	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d1fbe2ece2b9d90185f14792201bf1d3277a3c1.sol#774-784)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/5/0x3d1fbe2ece2b9d90185f14792201bf1d3277a3c1.sol#768-784)
